content: Our friendly country Turkey has built a very beautiful OjuKhana/(banyo) in my own area in Bangladesh. This area of ​​mine is not very prosperous. I was in dire need of such a "Banyo" in this area. My local people are very satisfied with this OjuKhana /Banyo from Turkey. I thank Turkey on behalf of myself and the people of the region for doing such a wonderful work .Urgent request to moderators if this post of mine is not suitable in this place then please transfer it to suitable place.

I thank Turkey on behalf of myself and the people of the region for doing such a wonderful work .Urgent request to moderators if this post of mine is not suitable in this place then please transfer it to suitable place.Actually, banyo isn't the right word brother. We call it hayrat (Normally its called fountains "çeşme" but we call it as a hayrat if the financer wants to make good deed) . It's coming from word "hayır" its mean like good deed or charity. And our religion Islam is encourage us to make good deed for our other life. All of our good and bad deeds will put us to hell or heaven. Under 3 circumstancies our good deeds still be counts even if we die. One of them is " Be part of charitable foundations, such as fountains, mosques, schools, hospitals, etc., and leaving behind permanent structures". And all of your regards should be to Mehmet and Hacer Reşat. They wanted to leave a good deed behind them and their wishes found you and your neighbourhood. Probably they wouldn't find your message but your prays find them. Whenever you drink water just pray for them
